data.text: @sxuninterrupted None just had sore arm at injection site
@sxuninterrupted 1st shot Monday, many friends have gotten both shots, nothing worse than mild flu <day.
@sxuninterrupted Jus got mine Friday no side effects except my arm hurts where i got the shot. My wife and mom got theirs same thing happened but they also felt tired like drained that's it
@sxuninterrupted I had it. No side effects apart from a slightly hungover feeling the next day

@sxuninterrupted Wife: Pfiezer - shot 1, sore arm. Shot 2 tired two days. 
Me: Moderna -shot 1 sore arm, achy joints first night then tired two days. 
Mother -Moderna - shot 1 only so far. Sore arm, tired a day. 
We know no one in our group of friends that had worse.
@sxuninterrupted Just some soreness at the injection site (Pfizer). Same for a couple family members of various age.
@sxuninterrupted JnJ Paul and fever and body aches for 12 hr.  I had a little headache.
@sxuninterrupted Both of us got the Moderna vaccine.  Mrs has had both and I have only had my first with second in 10 days. No issues at all.
@sxuninterrupted Got my J&J yesterday, looking good so far... (knock on wood!)
@sxuninterrupted I heard that some life insurance companies are not paying any benefits if a person dies after getting the vaccine due to it being an experimental drug.
@sxuninterrupted I had both Pfizer shots. 1st was just a sore arm. After the 2nd I had moderate flu like symptoms (fever around 100) and achy, but by 48 hours after I was totally fine.
@sxuninterrupted Just got the second Pfizer shot this morning. So far so good, but it's only been a few hours.
@sxuninterrupted Arm was sore after dose #1 for a day or two...other than that, no side effects!  My advice: drink tons of water on the days you get your vaccines.
@sxuninterrupted 2 Pfizer shots in January, a sore arm after the second shot, no other side effects.
@NewJay12 I 1000% sympathize 😅 Likely James won’t be getting his until fall the way things are going...

@LucaBra85403016 @sxuninterrupted Have you had covid ?
Wondered if there were any with some sort of natural immunities ?
caught it from my boss on Monday/Tuesday.. our symptoms were a little rough thru Sunday, but mostly done. 
My wife’s more severe symptoms lingered nearly month and half 🤷🏼‍♂️
@sxuninterrupted Millions of people in the uk, no issues. One of my friends her world is coming to an end. Side effect, a mild head ache. 🤣🤦‍♀️
@NewJay12 @sxuninterrupted Right like how is Canada 51 st in the world for vaccinations 💉
@sxuninterrupted @BirchSoul11 Australia had a little issue with giving to big a dose but thats sorted
@swingingflamin1 @sxuninterrupted 2 Pfizer shots no side effects
@sxuninterrupted @BirchSoul11 I know 2 mid 80s and 4 mid 70s and all ok
@sxuninterrupted 20 of my family in uk jad jab and all are fine no issues

@sxuninterrupted I know quite a few that got shot number 2 of the Pfizer ....-and had flu like symptoms for 2 days. 
We had the covid already, but will still get in line for vaccine in near future

@sxuninterrupted We both made it through A-ok. Wifey was a bit sickly the day after (lots of Shrill on the couch). Hubby was right as rain (CON +4) #dnd all said, totally worth it and not a big deal for us.
@sxuninterrupted My dad, in his mid-late 70’s had the sore arm, and maybe some tiredness and mild headache.. but I think that was it.
@sxuninterrupted Not doing it.
@BirchSoul11 I know two who have had serious side effects, but they were elderly. Just doing my best to know what I can :)
@sxuninterrupted My 93 year old gramma got it and just said it hurt but that's it
@sxuninterrupted I had Pfizer, shit 1 I had a head ache and was fatigued for day and a sore arm at the injection point.  Dose two I got yesterday just a sore arm, so far.
@sxuninterrupted No one that I know has had any negative effects. Just some soreness in the arm, or very light, mild immune response...
